channel.title: Repeated Event Find Chance
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Repeated Event Find Chance"

item.title: Re: Repeated Event Find Chance
item.content:encoded: Do ally drops use this type of system as well, or is it all up to chance? (i.e. Farming for Emo Rock CDs and such; does the drop rate increase for the duration you go without getting a CD?)

item.title: Re: Repeated Event Find Chance
item.content:encoded:
The chance is per prize, not per mission. So if you failed to get a Major Village Contract from one of the BurgerNinja Shift Change missions, not only does that increased chance apply to any Shift Change mission, but to any A, AA, or S rank mission that also drops Major Village Contracts.

Finally, I'm told that if you have an increased chance of getting a drop stored up, it loops with you, though I have not personally verified that.

item.title: Re: Repeated Event Find Chance
item.content:encoded: if you can find an ally/item/event on a regular mission but you don't get it, the next time you do the mission you'll have an increased chance of getting it. This chance increases each time you do the mission, but after you get whatever is there the increase goes back to 0.

item.title: Repeated Event Find Chance
item.content:encoded: what is this exactly and what does it do?
